name: Cubink
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Name: Keyboard Inputs /// Controller Inputs
  • Move: WASD / ↑ ↓ → ← /// D-Pad / Analog Stick;
  • Press Action Buttons: IJKL  / Mouse Press /// ABXY Buttons / Action Buttons;

PATCH NOTES:

  • v1.0.0.0:
    • Released version to the public and submitted to Mini Jam 111: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-111-colors.

KNOWN BUGS:

  • There might be some issues in detecting if 2 or more cubes touched each other.

T̴̰̱̬̥̬͇̯̒̅̄̓͑̈́͊̾͜͝ȟ̷̛̠͔̝̥̩͕͐͆̇̈́̑̚͜͝é̵͖̗͈̺̲̠̬̝̞̓̏͝r̸͈̙͙͕̱̠̱̲̔͜ë̸̡̝̝̦̜̰͈͈́̽͆͜ ̸̤̮̦͑̉̐͋̚͝į̶̫̜̝̟̈͌́s̵̥̤̖̆̀̎ ̵͈̭̃̈́͒͜a̵̡̰͇͙͖͕͕͓̽͑̊̑͝͝ ̵̳͐̈́s̴̘̻̯͛ę̷̢̳͇̈́̅͐͒̇̐͝ç̵̨̺̝̾͌r̷̺̬̎̇̊̋e̷̜͙̲͇̪͎̻̼̓͌̚t̴̥̥̀́̾̑̂̀͋͑ ̸͚͚̜͈̘̗̮̳̎͒̎K̵̳̖̺̳͋͐͑̈̊ơ̷̗̮̫̟̜̼͛̾̎̿͑̐̚d̴̛͍̮̦̗͔͕͑̕ě̴̼̙͉̗͔͕͈̤̰̒̒̑̓́̌ ̷̤͎̣̉̆̄t̶̖̠̳̣͐̓͛̽̍̊̌͛̈́ǒ̷͖̍̿͊̿́͘ ̸̩̮̍͑̏̈̋̉͒͘u̵̫̲͈̠͙̒͑̑͌̒̋ṇ̷̘̹͋̔̐͑͗́͗̕l̶̹͙̜͔̑̋o̸̭̖̓̔̒̎̆c̴̢͖̫̳̲̱̝̍̈́̽̋̃̅͆́͠k̴͚̄̆ ̸̬̜͗̊͛͗̂͛̈́̑͝ả̷̲̥͇̩̹͙̏ ̴̦̰̈́́̚͝d̴̢̤̄̐ę̶͖̤̯͉̦̬͓̱͐͑̈̆̋̃͝b̵̡̛̳̝̲͎̲̅̀̅͋̽̌̃̀u̵̢̠̖̲̘͖̰̙̔̎͂͑̓g̴̡͙̟͓͎̪̔̇̎̐̌͜͝ ̷̰̖̻̪̞̣̟̈́͂̅̈́͠m̴̞͈͇͇͕̿͂̊̍̌͝͠ȩ̵̪̱͈̝͔̩͎͋͆̿̇̈͆̒͘n̶̬̫̣̫͎̻̟̯̿ǔ̷̞̗͉͙̗̅́͘͜͝.̵̜̞̹̟̱̳̒
